author: kwall
msg: QPID-5472: [Java Broker] Connection model object attribute PORT should return the name of the Port

* Also addressed review comments from Andrew MacBean (namely, HttpManagement#stop should chain the underlying exception).

author: markt
msg: (using Eclipse's generated code for equals() and hashCode() with just formatting changes)

author: markt
msg: Prep for fixing a FindBugs issue in a sub-class
- Add a short-cut to equals for the same object
- Use explicit tests rather than exception handling (should be faster)
- Use all of the fields for the hashCode to improve performance when used in HashTables etc.
